Common.promptPlaceholder: What do you want to create?
Common.aspectRatioDescription: Choose the output ratio that best fits your scene.
Common.publishDescription: Turn this off to keep the result private.

errors.submitFailedRetry: Submission failed, please try again later
errors.uploadMissing: Please upload at least one reference image
errors.transitionImagesRequired: Please upload both intro and outro images

TextToImage.title: Text to Image
TextToImage.placeholder: Describe the image you'd like to create
TextToImage.example: Wildflower Trail Dolphin Shadow Butterfly Closeup

ImageToImage.title: Image to Image
ImageToImage.placeholder: Describe how you want to transform the references

TextToVideo.title: Text to Video
TextToVideo.placeholder: Describe the motion clip you need
TextToVideo.aspectRatioDescription: Choose the aspect ratio for the final clip.

ImageToVideo.title: Image to Video
ImageToVideo.introDescription: Used at the beginning of the video
ImageToVideo.outroDescription: Used at the end of the video
ImageToVideo.placeholder: Describe how the motion should look
ImageToVideo.cropRequirement: Failed to upload the image. The shorter side should exceed 360 pixels.

videoSection.title: Upload Video
videoSection.description: Supports mp4, mov, webm, and other common formats.
videoSection.placeholder: Drag a video here or click to upload

audioSection.title: Upload Audio
audioSection.description: Supports mp3, wav, aac, etc. The system will sync to this audio.
audioSection.placeholder: Drag an audio file here or click to upload

messages.uploading: Files are still uploading, please wait.
messages.uploadRequired: Please upload both the video and audio files first.
messages.invalidFileType: Unsupported file type. Please select a valid file.

errors.uploadRetry: File upload failed. Please try again later.
errors.reuploadRequired: Upload failed. Please re-upload the files before trying again.
errors.taskFailed: Lip sync task submission failed. Please try again later.

SoundGeneration.title: Sound Effects
SoundGeneration.promptPlaceholder: Describe the sound effect you'd like to hear...
SoundGeneration.example: The sound of gentle ocean waves crashing against the shore, rhythmic and calming, with soft splashes and distant seagulls in the background

tooltips.shareDisabled: Only public jobs can be shared.

PromptEnhancer.title: AI Prompt Booster
PromptEnhancer.subtitle: Turn any idea into a clearer prompt for better generations.
PromptEnhancer.inputPlaceholder: e.g., a cat dancing under moonlight

errors.fetchFailed: Failed to query the prompt enhancement task.
errors.notFound: Prompt enhancement task does not exist.
errors.improvementFailed: Prompt enhancement failed. Please try again later.
errors.timeout: Prompt enhancement timed out. Please try again later.
errors.createFailed: Failed to create prompt enhancement task. Please try again later.
errors.unknown: Failed to enhance the prompt. Please try again later.
